Package Owner

Class OwnerProxy

java.lang.Object
Owner.OwnerProxy
All Implemented Interfaces:
SocketProxy
public class OwnerProxy extends Object implements SocketProxy
Classe per l'implementazione del pattern Proxy per il collegamento tramite socket tra Client e Server
Author:
Filomena De Rosa, Sara Terlizzi
